name: Citizens & Northern Corporation
description: Citizens & Northern Corporation is a financial holding company headquartered in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1864, the company operates through its principal subsidiary, Citizens & Northern Bank, which provides a comprehensive range of banking services, including personal and commercial banking, investment services, and wealth management solutions. With a strong commitment to community banking, Citizens & Northern emphasizes local decision-making and customer service. The bank serves a diverse clientele, including individuals, businesses, and municipalities, across several counties in northern Pennsylvania and southern New York. Citizens & Northern takes pride in its personalized service, competitive products, and dedication to the communities it serves. The bank offers various deposit products, loans, and mortgages tailored to meet the needs of its customers. Additionally, the corporation is actively involved in local community initiatives and philanthropic efforts, reinforcing its mission to support the growth and well-being of the regions it serves. Citizens & Northern Corporation continues to focus on enhancing its digital banking capabilities and expanding its service offerings to adapt to the evolving financial landscape while maintaining its core values of integrity, accountability, and customer commitment.

seo.meta_title: Citizens & Northern Corporation | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Citizens & Northern Corporation, a community-focused financial institution providing banking and investment services in Northern Pennsylvania and New York.

faq.question: What services does Citizens & Northern provide?
faq.answer: Citizens & Northern provides personal banking, business banking, investment services, and wealth management.

faq.question: Where is Citizens & Northern headquartered?
faq.answer: Citizens & Northern is headquartered in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Citizens & Northern?
faq.answer: William E. McCarty is the CEO of Citizens & Northern Corporation.
